title: [BUG] An exception is raised when trying to resize an SKBitmap image using an SKInfo structure.
body:
**Description**

An exception is raised when trying to resize an SKBitmap image using an SKInfo structure. The exception message is: "Passing the size parameters directly  into the function does work."

Passing the size parameters (width and height) directly  into the function does work.

**Code**
```
                    SKImageInfo info = new SKImageInfo
                    {
                        Width = (int)Math.Floor(bitmap.Width * 0.25),
                        Height = (int)Math.Floor(bitmap.Height * 0.25)
                    };
                    bitmap= bitmap.Resize(info, SKFilterQuality.High); // this line causes the exception

                    // doing it like this works:
                    bitmap = bitmap.Resize(new SKImageInfo((int)Math.Floor(bitmap.Width * 0.25), 
                        (int)Math.Floor(bitmap.Height * 0.25)), SKFilterQuality.High);

```
